/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Vehicles of various sizes, including a blue truck and a white car, are seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
